2021-06-14 00:31:20

neuroasketic

in brandon sanderson's novel mistborn he posits a unique magical system based on ‚Äúburning‚Äù trace amounts of rare metals in one's system

this visual returns to me as i consider attention as fuel

most of the time yr attention is being flared off like natural gas in africa

yet attention has increasing marginal utility. it follows a law of increasing returns. the value of each additional quantum of attention outstrips that of the last, perhaps geometrically

u can demonstrate this to yrself by running the claim backwards: once distracted from a focused task, each additional distraction has a marginal effect. to multitask eleven items is √± more helpful than to multitask twelve items. once the spell has been broken any peasant can wander on êëÑ scene

yr aim as mentat is to cultivate a skill of attention surplus. there are a few ways to deal with distractions:

  1. deal w/ distraction when it arises (rapid interrupt cycle)
  2. cache distraction (delayed interrupt cycle)
  3. reframe s. t. distractions are forgiven (forgiveness cycle) [e.g. accept consequences as circumstances and move forwards]
  4. hone ability to focus (unbroken cycle)

this last is a paramount skill: blinders on yr ability to reason, stillness amid the storm. meditation (any of the three varieties) can aid this, as can embodied cognitive caches
